description:
Nowadays,it is a heatedly discussed topic that empty-nesters,which has become a social problem we often follow with interest . Most of the middle-aged people have to leave their parents to seek for a better life. But their elderly parents at home to take care of themselves.The situation in rural area in more serious,there are no activities for them so that they are busy with the farm work to eke out a living.
     Filial piety is a traditional national culture in China.when we are as a child,our parents in order to bring up us,they can give up all things.However, they are becoming increasingly lonely when they ageing from day to day. 
it’s our responsibility to care for our parents and our care is what they really need in life. So, no matter how busy you are, remember to care about them, talk to them frequently.
     At length,I want to say :the place with the family members that is called the real family,May I wish all the parents healthy, and let our when children take up ways of often home to see, listen to parents' feelings.
